sourceDesc.p: Converted from a Word document written by mharty

list.item: convert those “,” things to just comma
for MH text files, insert corresponding MH citation

body.p: “Centaurea- one or 2 flowerets XXXX- There is a cool wind from east which makes it cool walking tha tway while it is melting hot walking westward.- Spear leaved thistle ap several days- some being withered. The larger pinweed ap a few days-prob. same date with the minor. its lower leaves dull red those of L. minor equally red or brighter. Some Amelanchier obovata leaves a light dirty scarlet. Boehmeria prob 2 or 3 days at L. ciliata Corner road. Zizania a day XXX with a handsome light green panicle a foot or more long- a long slender stem & corn-like leaves frequently more than an inch wide. Diervilla leaves dull red & green. The large primrose lower leaves a clear dark red. The Epilobium coloratum lowe rleaves very dark red.”
"XVII / 13 February-3 September 1854 / NNPM MA 1302:23 / PE 8, p.241 vol.8; Torrey JVI & JVII, p.#"
